tool_description: This API allows the client to verify the integrity and validity of a medical certificate
title: MCI NMC Doctor Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: MCI / NMC Doctor Verification
api_list.description:
This API allows the client to verify the integrity and validity of a medical certificate

Use GET Call API to fetch results, using the request_id obtained in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mci-nmc-doctor-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/nmc_doctor"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mci-nmc-doctor-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
